amendment.description: To acknowledge the contributions of nongovernmental organizations in Cambodia.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1586 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1586 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator McCain. (consideration: CR S7309; text: CR S7309) To acknowledge the contributions of nongovernmental organizations in Cambodia.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1586 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator McCain.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1586 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
